level.heading: Judicial notice.
level.text: All courts within the District of Columbia shall take judicial notice of the acts and resolutions published in the District of Columbia Statutes-at-Large.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-19, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-601.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-153, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-611.
